All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Add
The add command adds a new medium to the collection
BibTexException
Exception for runtime errors inside the bibtex module
BibTexParameter
Class representing a bibtex parameter inside the bibtex struct
BibTexParameterType
Type of bibtex parameter
BibTexParser
Class for parsing a media object from a bib tex string
BibTexPersistency
 
BibTexStruct
Class representing a bibtex query with a type and parameters
BibTexType
Type of bibtex (e.g.
BinaryPersistency
Write and read collection data to a serialized binary file
Book
This class is used to represent a paper (newspaper) storage medium
CD
This class is used to represent a CD storage medium
Clear
Clear the collection from all medium data
CLI
CLI interface for the library
Collection
Main class for the management of all the entries in the library
Communication
Class for handling communication with the user
ConnectDatabaseServer
Connect to a database server
DatabaseException
Exception for handling database errors
DiscardProcessOutputBuffer
Output buffer standin for discarding all output
DisconnectDatabaseServer
Disconnect the database server
Drop
Drop a medium (or multiple) from the collection by title or id
DuplicateEntryException
Exception for handling duplicate entry's
ElectronicalMedium
This class is used to represent an electronic storage medium
HumanReadablePersistency
Class for writing human-readable data to a file
ICLIEndpoint
Endpoint for a cli path (usually a function)
ICLIHelpContainer
 
IColorCodes
Interface for storing color codes
IExceptionUserReadable
Interface for making an exception supply a user readable error message
IGlobalOutputBufferListener
Methods for all classes listening to the global output buffer
IPersistency
Interface for saving and loading collection data
ISBNUtils
This class is used to handle ISBNs
ISBNUtils.ISBNException
Exception subclass for ISBN errors
IServerAddress
 
Library
Main class for managing the library
List
List all the mediums in the collection with some display options
LoadBibtex
Load collection data from a bibtex representation
LoadBinary
Load collection data from a binary file
LoadDatabase
Load collection data from the database
Main
Main class of the project
Medium
This class is used as a template for all storage mediums
Message
Clas representing a message
Node<T,C>
Class representing a Node in a tree
Paper
This class is used to represent a paper (newspaper) storage medium
PercistencyException
Exception for persistency operations
ProcessOutputBuffer
This class represents an output buffer for a process
SaveBibtex
Save a collection as bibtex representation
SaveBinary
Save the collection as binary representation
Search
Search medium in the collection by title or id
Server
Class representing the database server
ServerAddressScopes
Enum for different data bank servers
Severity
Enum for the severity of a message
Status
 
StatusSet
Set the status of a medium (checked_out or available)

Test class
TextUtils
Class for text util functions
URLUtils
This class is used to handle URLs
URLUtils.URLException
Exception subclass for URL errors
